seo.title: Catholic Church Discipleship Pathway - Brewww Studio
seo.description: Discover how Saint Dominic Catholic Church's website was transformed to guide parishioners on their faith journey with Brewww Studio.

sections.title: Guiding Faith Journeys with a Discipleship Pathway
sections.content: Saint Dominic Catholic Church, a vibrant community in Panama City, needed a rebrand and a new website to help parishioners navigate their faith journey. They wanted a discipleship pathway that could guide users based on their spiritual stage, utilizing their rich content and on-campus video production studio.

sections.title: Key Insight
sections.content: By creating a visual structure that indicates stages like Encounter, Form, and Evangelize, we could help parishioners understand and engage with the content relevant to their faith journey, fostering deeper connections and growth.

sections.title: Our Strategy
sections.content: We aimed to create a website that is both visually appealing and highly functional, emphasizing user stories, a robust history page, galleries, and the ability to search and sort through over 50 ministries. The strategy involved leveraging their existing content and video production capabilities to create a dynamic and engaging online presence.

sections.title: Solution at a Glance
sections.content: Our solution was to design a vibrant, user-friendly website that effectively communicates Saint Dominic's mission and resources. The site features clear navigation, engaging content, and beautiful visuals that reflect their commitment to guiding parishioners on their faith journey.
highlights: Visual structure indicating stages of faith journey: Encounter, Form, Evangelize
User stories to share personal faith journeys
Search and sorting functionality for over 50 ministries
